Class UiWidgetAdapterGwtAbstractDialogWindow

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadAccessKey, AttributeReadAltText, AttributeReadAttribute, AttributeReadClosable, AttributeReadColumnSpan, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadFocused, AttributeReadHeightInRows, AttributeReadHtmlId, AttributeReadImage<UiWidgetImage>, AttributeReadLabel, AttributeReadLengthProperty, AttributeReadMaximizable, AttributeReadMaximized, AttributeReadMaximumTextLength, AttributeReadMovable, AttributeReadPosition, AttributeReadPrimaryStyle, AttributeReadResizable, AttributeReadSelectionMode, AttributeReadSizeInPixel, AttributeReadStringTitle, AttributeReadStyles, AttributeReadStylesAdvanced, AttributeReadTooltip, AttributeReadUrl, AttributeReadValidationFailure, AttributeWriteAttribute, AttributeWriteClosable, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteHtmlId, AttributeWriteImage<UiWidgetImage>, AttributeWriteLengthProperty, AttributeWriteMaximizable, AttributeWriteMaximized, AttributeWriteMovable, AttributeWriteOnlyAttribute, AttributeWritePosition, AttributeWritePrimaryStyle, AttributeWriteResizable, AttributeWriteStringTitle, AttributeWriteStyles, AttributeWriteStylesAdvanced, AttributeWriteTooltip, UiWidgetAdapter, UiWidgetAdapterComposite<UiWidgetRegular>, UiWidgetAdapterDynamicComposite<UiWidgetRegular>, UiWidgetAdapterAbstractDialogWindow, UiWidgetAdapterAbstractWindow, HandlerRegistrationCollector, AttributeReadDisposed, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadTitle<String>, AttributeWriteDisposed, AttributeWriteId<String>, AttributeWriteTitle<String>, Accessibility
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UiWidgetAdapterGwtPopup, UiWidgetAdapterGwtWindow

    public abstract class UiWidgetAdapterGwtAbstractDialogWindow
extends UiWidgetAdapterGwtAbstractWindow<PopupWindow>
implements UiWidgetAdapterAbstractDialogWindow
    This is the implementation of UiWidgetAdapterAbstractDialogWindow using GWT based on PopupWindow.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • applyEventAdapter

        protected void applyEventAdapter(EventAdapterGwt adapter)
        This method applies the given event adapter to the widget(s) so it receive native events. It will be called only once. Override only to add specific event registrations.
        Overrides:
        applyEventAdapter in class AbstractUiWidgetAdapterWithEvents<PopupWindow,EventAdapterGwt>
        Parameters:
        adapter - is the event adapter.

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        visible - - true to set visible (show), false to set invisible (hide).
        programmatic - - see UiEvent.isProgrammatic().
        See Also:
        AttributeWriteVisibleAdvanced.setVisible(boolean, boolean)

      • getWidthInPixel

        public double getWidthInPixel()
        This method gets the width of this object in pixels.
        NOTE:
        The result will typically be an int value. However, to be compatible with Length.getAmount() and with some underlying native toolkits we use double to prevent potential information loss.
        Specified by:
        getWidthInPixel in interface AttributeReadSizeInPixel
        Overrides:
        getWidthInPixel in class UiWidgetAdapterGwt<PopupWindow>
        Returns:
        the width.

        Specified by:
        isMaximizable in interface AttributeReadMaximizable
        Returns:
        true if the object is maximizable, false otherwise.

      • setMaximizable

        public void setMaximizable(boolean maximizable)
        This method set the maximizable state of this object.
        Specified by:
        setMaximizable in interface AttributeWriteMaximizable
        Parameters:
        maximizable - - true if a (icon) button shall be available to (un)maximize the object (window), false otherwise.
        See Also:
        AttributeReadMaximizable.isMaximizable()

      • isMaximized

        public boolean isMaximized()
        This method determines if this object is maximized. In this case the size is fully expanded to cover the entire screen (also called full-screen).
        Specified by:
        isMaximized in interface AttributeReadMaximized
        Returns:
        true if the object is maximized, false otherwise.

      • setMaximized

        public void setMaximized(boolean maximized)
        This method (un)maximizes the object. If it is un-maximized, its size and position will be restored to the values before it was maximized.
        Specified by:
        setMaximized in interface AttributeWriteMaximized
        Parameters:
        maximized - - true to maximize, false to un-maximize.
        See Also:
        AttributeReadMaximized.isMaximized()

      • setLength

        public void setLength(LengthProperty property,
                      Length length)
        This method sets the specified length of this object.
        E.g. the call of setLength(LengthProperty.WIDTH, value) will return the same result as setWidth(value).
        Specified by:
        setLength in interface AttributeWriteLengthProperty
        Overrides:
        setLength in class UiWidgetAdapterGwt<PopupWindow>
        Parameters:
        property - is the LengthProperty identifying the actual property to set.
        length - is the new length to set.
